languages.text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} это письмо на телах еретиков, замышлявших покушение. Что вы об этом скажете?"

traits.locale_text: "Я обнаружил это письмо на телах еретиков, замышлявших покушение. Что вы об этом скажете?"

languages.text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
languages.original_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} это письмо на телах еретиков, замышлявших покушение. Что вы об этом скажете?"

traits.locale_text: "I have found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics planning the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
"I have found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics planning the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
"I have found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics planning the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
"I have found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics planning the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
"I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"
"I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

languages.text: 「襲撃計画に参加して死んだ異端者のひとりが、こんな手紙を持っていた。これについて何を知っている？」
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: 「襲撃計画に参加して死んだ異端者のひとりが、こんな手紙を持っていた。これについて何を知っている？」

languages.text: “我在组织袭击的异端分子身上找到了这封信，你有什么线索吗？”
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: “我在意图刺杀的异端分子身上找到了这封信，你有什么线索吗？”

languages.text: « J'ai trouvé cette lettre sur le cadavre de l'un des hérétiques qui a voulu attenter à ma vie. Que pouvez-vous me dire à ce sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai trouvé cette lettre sur le cadavre de l'un des hérétiques qui a voulu attenter à ma vie. Que pouvez-vous me dire à ce sujet ? »

languages.text: «He encontrado esta carta en uno de los cadáveres de los herejes que planearon el ataque. ¿Qué puede decirme al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: «He encontrado esta carta en uno de los cadáveres de los herejes que planeaban el ataque. ¿Qué puede decirme al respecto?».

languages.text: "Ich habe diesen Brief bei einem der toten Attentäter gefunden. Was könnt Ihr mir darüber sagen?"
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe diesen Brief bei einem der toten Attentäter gefunden. Was könnt Ihr mir darüber sagen?"

languages.text: "Bu mektup, saldırıyı planlayan kâfirlerin üstünden çıktı. Bununla ilgili bir malumatın var mı?"
languages.original_text: "I found this letter on one of the bodies of the heretics who planned the attack. What can you tell me about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu mektup, saldırıyı planlayan kâfirlerin üstünden çıktı. Bir malumatın var mı?"
